## `SetDifficultTextHighlightColor`

Sets the font color for difficult text in formatted reports for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetDifficultTextHighlightColor(number red,
                               number green,
                               number blue)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `number` red | The red channel of the color (should be between 0--255). |
| `number` green | The green channel of the color (should be between 0--255). |
| `number` blue | The blue channel of the color (should be between 0--255). |
